name: Ukiyo-E
description:
Story

The story of the grudge of a boy whose family is murdered 

In order to find the truth, the boy came to this town, but was murdered by a mysterious person. 

Will the boy survive this place and find the truth?

Already on you!!!

How To Play

Control

  • Press  W  key for walk.
  • Press A D key for Rotate camera.
  • Left mouse button- click to attack enemy.
  • Should stand still to attack because he is ronin.

Rule

  • In map1 You have to defeat enemy and find the red heron origami in this map.
  • In map2 You have to defeat enemy and the boss of this stage.
  • In map3 You have to defeat enemy and must destroy the door in order to enter, must fight the lastboss and defeat her to win this game.

Credits

  • Thanusak Wuttisak
  • Arinchai Promkantrong
  • Vutikit Meesomboon
